name: Title Text Narrow
editableFields: Title: Text that returns as 'Title Placeholder' in HTML mockup
Link Text: Text that returns at end of the description to be hyperlinked (can be NULL in which case there will be no link)
Link Text URL: HREF and target window to link up the Linktext with
Target: Weather you want the link to open in a new window or not
description: Displays a Title box with a paragraph and linked text at end of paragraph
